name: Awkward Attack
value: You take a -2 penalty to AC for 1d4 rounds.

name: Bad Headbutt
value: You are stunned for 1 round (Fort negates).

name: Battered
value: You take a -2 penalty on skill checks and saves for 1d4 hours.

name: Bleeding Fist
value: You take 1d6 points of bleed.

name: Bone Bruise
value: You take 1d2 points of CON damage.

name: Broke A Nail
value: You take 1d4 points of damage and you cannot use this attack until healed.

name: Broken Tooth
value: You take a -2 penalty on attack rolls for 1d6 minutes.

name: Bruised Ego
value: You can attack no other target for 1d4 rounds (or until the target is dead.)

name: Brutal Collision
value: Your attack hits, but you are stunned for 2 rounds (Fort save reduces the stun to 1 round).

name: Caught Your Attack
value: The target may attempt to trip, bull rush, or overrun you (target's choice)

name: Don't Pick At It
value: You take 1 point of CON damage.

name: Eye Strain
value: You are blinded for 1 round.

name: Ferocious Fumble
value: Your attack hits an ally within reach and is a critical threat. You must roll to confirm the critical hit.

name: Fist Meets Face
value: The attack hits you and is a critical threat. You must roll to confirm the critical hit.

name: Frustration
value: You take a -4 penalty on all attack rolls for 1 round.

name: Got Too Close
value: Your attack hits the target but the target may start a grapple against you for free.

name: Great Roar
value: You are deafened until healed (DC 15 Heal check)

name: He Bit Your Fist
value: The target deals bite damage to you.

name: He's Sharp
value: You take 1d6 points of damage + your STR modifier.

name: Head, Meet Wall
value: You dazed for 1d3 rounds.

name: I Bit My Tug
value: You take 1 point of bleed.

name: Ingrown Nail
value: You take a -1 penalty on attack rolls until you score a critical hit.

name: Hangnail
value: If this was a claw attack, slam, or unarmed strike, you cannot use that attack for 1d6 rounds.

name: Jam A Finger
value: Your target takes normal damage, you take double damage.

name: Just A Taste
value: Your attack hits an ally adjacent to you or the target.

name: Muscle Tear
value: You take 1d4 points of STR damage.

name: Not The Weak Point
value: Your enemy's armor takes 1d6 points of damage. You take 1d6 points of damage and cannot use that attack for 1d3 rounds.

name: Off Balance
value: You can only take a move action next round.

name: Out Of Position
value: You cannot use this attack for 1 round.

name: Overexertion
value: You are exhausted (Fort negates).

name: Overextend
value: You provoke an attack of opportunity from all adjacent opponents.

name: Overthink It
value: Your target's armor and Natural Fumble armor bonuses are doubled against you for 3 rounds.

name: Pinched Nerve
value: If you had reach greater than 5 feet, it is reduced to 5 feet for 3 rounds.

name: Pins And Needles
value: You are sickened for 1d6 rounds.

name: Punctured Foot
value: You take 1d3 points of damage, and your speed is halved until healed.

name: Smash The Floor
value: You kick up dust that blinds you for 1d4 rounds (Fort negates).

name: Sneeze!
value: You are dazed for 1 round.

name: Sprain
value: You take 1d4 points of DEX damage.

name: Stinging Failure
value: You take 1d6 points of nonlethal damage and a -2 penalty on attack rolls with that attack for 1d4 rounds.

name: Tiring Attack
value: You are fatigued.

name: Torn Muscle
value: You take 1 of STR drain (Fort negates)

name: Tripped
value: You are knocked prone.

name: Twisted
value: You become entangled in your gear until you spend a standard action to free yourself.

name: Unintentional Move
value: Move 10 feet in a random direction and provoke attacks of opportunity as normal.

name: We Have A Weiner
value: You fall unconscious for 1d6 rounds (Will negates).

name: Whiff
value: The attack deals damage to you instead of the target.

name: Whirlwind Of Shame
value: Your attack deals damage to all targets adjacent to you except the original target.

name: Wide Open
value: You are flat-footed for 1 round.

name: Winds Of Change
value: You threaten no squares for 1d6 rounds.
